content: double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet side a in the next two double_crochet and in the next two chain-1 spaces work 2 double_crochet with ch1 between each this double_crochet b move to the next chain-1 space and work 2dc with ch1 between each this double_crochet c ch1 skip treble_crochet r85b repeat b and c 40 more times close with 1 slip_stitch in the first double_crochet total 408 double_crochet 98 per side 4 per corner 200 chain-1 space 49 per side 1 per corner continue images r86 round 87 jade this round is worked only on the sides a star in the first fptr of the r86 1fptr ch3 move tho the next fptr r86 repeat 41 more times fasten of b repeat in the anothers sides total 168 fptr 42 per side 164 chain-3 spaces 41 per side continue images r87 round 88 spring green corner start in the chain-1 corner space work 2 double_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet side a in the next two double_crochet and in the next three chain-1 spaces work 2 double_crochet with ch1 between each this double_crochet b move to the next chain-1 space and work 2dc with ch1 between each this double_crochet c ch1 skip treble_crochet r85b repeat b and c 41 more times finish with 2dc in 1 st separated by ch1 close with 1 slip_stitch in the first double_crochet total 408 double_crochet 98 per side 4 per corner 200 chain-1 space 49 per side 1 per corner continue images r88 round 89 jade hedge / shrubs a sides repeat round 87 across the side work fptr ch3 from post to post ending with fptr fasten_off b repeat around all 4 sides total 168 fptr 42 per side 164 chain-3 spaces 41 per side round 90 jade a start in the chain-1 space r88 work puff3 ch1 puff3 b skip first double_crochet of r88 b work 1 fphdc around each stitch and 1 half_double_crochet in each chain-1 space around the edge skip last double_crochet of 88 c repeat around all 4 sides d join with 1 slip_stitch in the closing chain of the first puff total 438 fphdc 146 per side 204 half_double_crochet 51 per side 8 puff3 2 per side 4 chain-1 spaces 1 per corner round 91 corner flowers dandelion + pomegranate a dandelion center work into a magic_ring magic_ring 1 single_crochet ch1 x 8 pull ring tight join with 1 slip_stitch in the first single_crochet you now have 8 chain-1 spaces total 8 single_crochet 8 chain-1 spaces b pomegranate petals join pomegranate in any chain-1 space in each chain-1 space around work 1 popcorn ch2 join with 1 slip_stitch in the closing chain of the first popcorn fasten_off total 8 popcorn 8 chain-2 spaces popcorn = popcorn use your project s popcorn definition if you haven t defined it elsewhere the standard is 5 double_crochet popcorn c make & attach make 4 flowers total then sew 1 flower onto each corner centered over the spring green corner area weave in ends neatly round
